name: My R&D Project
description:
The Escape Rooms is an accessibility puzzle game. The game was created as part of my dissertation at University. The aim of this project was to showcase the importance of accessibility in the industry. There are four playable levels, in which each level covers a different accessibility feature.

Objective

Each of the four levels requires the player to find a keycode which contains a number, this number must then be entered into the locked door to complete the level. 

Controls

- Movement: WASD

- Jump: Spacebar

- Interact: E

- Pause Game: P

- Accessibility Navigation: Arrow Keys

- Accessibility Enter Selected: Enter Key
